column4: So, it turns out my family's ubuntu machine was probably turning off because the CPU was overheating.  After opening the case, we found that the CPU fan was dangling, detached from the CPU because the plastic mounting lug had broken.
had this happen to a clients server recently, had to super glue the bracket back together and its still holding :D
Ah!  Good to know; I thought super glue might not work...
I had to let it dry overnight as the first time I tried to fit the hsf it broke back offl; I was lucky the small piece of plastic was still inside the server
